How We Can Help

Whether you need someone for a day or looking to hire full-time, we've got different ways to get you the help you need.

Need People Today?

Got a project starting tomorrow? Equipment showing up Monday? We can usually get you workers same-day.

  • Same-day placement
  • Already background checked
  • Show up ready to work
  • Any skill level
Learn more

Try Before You Hire

Not sure if someone's a good fit? Let them work temp first. If you like them, keep them. No pressure.

  • Test them out first
  • Less hiring risk
  • See how they work
  • Make sure they fit in
Learn more

Emergency Help

Someone called in sick? Equipment broke down? We're available 24/7 for those "oh crap" moments.

  • Call anytime
  • Emergency response
  • Get people fast
  • Experienced workers
Learn more

We Handle the Paperwork

Taxes, insurance, workers comp - all that headache stuff. You just tell us who worked and we handle the rest.

  • Tax stuff handled
  • Workers comp included
  • Payroll done for you
  • Less paperwork for you
Learn more

Need People Right Now?

Don't stress - we've got this. Give us a call and we'll figure out how to get you the help you need.

Why Work With Us?

Look, there are lots of staffing companies out there. Here's what makes us different and why San Diego businesses keep calling us back.

We're Legit

Licensed, insured, bonded - all that legal stuff is covered so you don't have to worry about it.

We Answer the Phone

Call us at 2 AM because your crew didn't show? We'll answer. Emergencies happen, we get it.

Good People

We actually check people out before sending them to you. Background checks, references, the works.

Been Around Forever

Started in 1990. We've seen it all and we're still here. That's gotta count for something.

We Call Back Fast

Usually within an hour, but we promise 2 hours max. None of this "we'll get back to you" nonsense.

We Know San Diego

Local company, local workers, local knowledge. We know the venues, the sites, the people.

What's Included (No Extra Charges)

Real employees (W-2, not contractors)
Workers comp is covered
We handle all the tax stuff
No contracts to lock you in
Work with your schedule
If someone doesn't work out, we'll replace them
Safety training included
Local San Diego company
